thread.title: UAE government workshop highlights importance of using scenario planning as tool to achieve excellence
thread.title_full: UAE government workshop highlights importance of using scenario planning as tool to achieve excellence | MENAFN.COM

author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: UAE government workshop highlights importance of using scenario planning as tool to achieve excellence
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM)) The UAE government has organised a workshop entitled 'Scenario planning as a tool to shape the future' to discuss the importance of strategic planning in achieving government excellence. The event saw the participation of 100 specialists in strategic planning and government excellence from various federal government entities.

The workshop was organised to support federal government bodies prepare for the Strategic Plan 2017-2021, training them to make scientific evaluations based on potential future scenarios and develop integrated systems to shape the future. The workshop was also aimed at enabling the participants to analyse the internal and external environment and identify emerging opportunities.

Ohood Al Roumi, Director-General of the Prime Minister's Office, said the event is part of a series of seminars and events being organised with the active participation of government agencies in line with the directives of His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai, to adopt a proactive approach to convert scenarios into innovative solutions that promote government performance to achieve the highest satisfaction levels and increase people's happiness.

She also said the aim of the workshop was to enhance the capabilities of the participants to use innovative ideas to raise efficiency levels and improve services in line with the objectives of UAE Vision 2021. The workshop, conducted by the Prime Minister's Office, highlighted the importance of employing scenarios as tools to anticipate challenges and future trends to develop effective innovative solutions.

It explained how strategic planning can use scenarios to support the decision-making process and discussed the process of generating innovative ideas by thinking differently through teamwork, especially between different departments and entities, keeping in mind the relationship between shaping the future and excellence in the UAE.

The workshop is part of plans to organise more specialised seminars and workshops led by experts to provide government entities with a set of integrated tools to help shape the future.
